_header: Tell not thy friend all that thou wost
_description: Warning against telling all one knows, in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook — a single stanza of eight lines

NLS18721.First Lines:
Tel nouth þi frend al [þat þu wost]ffor perauenture
                    or it cum to e[ ]…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þat þu ne þornouth seþ [ ]Queþer
                    þu gost or wakst [ ]
NLS18721.Note: The endings of all the lines are defective.
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 1.
